q1.q: How will I receive my meal plan?
q1.a: We‚Äôll send it to your email as a PDF file including clear tables and charts.

q3.q: How long does the plan last?
q3.a: We typically create a 7-day plan with 35 unique meals ‚Äî you can reuse or modify it as needed.

q5.q: What if I don‚Äôt have kitchen scales?
q5.a: Portions are listed, but approximate measures (spoon, cup, pieces) are fine. Focus on variety and balance rather than precision.

q10.q: Where do you get nutritional data?
q10.a: We use verified food databases and our own computational models.

q11.q: What if I dislike a recipe?
q11.a: The plan includes multiple options, so you can always choose your favorite. The Premium plan also allows food exclusions.

hero.title: Cookies
hero.lead: We use cookies on FitLime so the site works correctly, stays secure, and we can keep improving it. Below is a summary of the cookie types, why we use them, and how to manage your consent.

how.title: How cookies work
how.text: Cookies are small text files saved in your browser. They let the site remember basic settings so everything runs smoothly and securely.
how.li1: Keep language, form content, and other essential choices.
how.li2: Help maintain secure operation and protect against abuse.
how.li3: Optionally collect anonymized traffic data to improve the site.

types.title: Which types we use
types.essential: Essential ‚Äî power the site (language choice, form state). They cannot be turned off because the site would not work.
types.analytics: Analytics ‚Äî anonymous measurement of traffic and performance. Enabled only after your consent.
types.marketing: Marketing ‚Äî personalization and third-party campaigns. Used only if you explicitly allow them.

manage.title: How to change or withdraw consent
manage.step1: On the homepage, a banner appears on first visit so you can accept or decline optional cookies.
manage.step2: You can reset your choice anytime via the button below or by clearing cookies in your browser.
manage.step3: Technical cookies stay active so the site can run and show you the consent banner again.
manage.resetHint: Removes your previous consent in this browser and will show the cookie banner on your next visit.
manage.resetAlert: Cookie settings were cleared. After returning to the homepage, the consent banner will appear again.
